resources.string: New to Alfresco? Create a free online account to store and access your content from anywhere.
Choose this option if you already have an Alfresco Cloud account or you want to connect to an Alfresco Server
If you want to learn more about Alfresco Mobile take a look at our guide in the Help area
New to Alfresco? Sign Up for a free account
New to Alfresco? Sign Up for a free account
Description (Optional). By default it\'s Alfresco Server
Please fill Username, Password and Hostname fields.
Your hostname and service URL value seem to be wrong. Please check your account settings.
Your account is ready for you to use.
Your account is not activated. Please check the Manage Account screen.
Your account is still waiting for verification
Unable to authenticate. Check your account settings.

Your hostname value seems to be wrong
or you may need to activate your VPN.
Please check your account settings.

Your device has no data connection.

Please check your device settings and enable a data connection.

You are not allowed to access this server.
Please check your account settings (Username/Password).

Your service url value is incorrect.
Please check your account settings.

The server is temporarily unable to service your request due to maintenance downtime or capacity problems.
Please try again later.

Your server couldn\'t be reached.
Please check your account settings.

Your port value is incorrect.
Please check your account settings.

The server\'s security certificate is not trusted!

The third-party organization that issued your server destination\'s certificate is not one that your device recognizes.
In order for Alfresco Mobile to verify that you\'re connecting with the appropriate server, its certificate must be from a trusted organization.
If your server has a self-signed certificate please add it to your device to successfully connect.

The server\'s security certificate has expired or is not yet valid!

Please check the date and time your device is set to.
If the problem persists please contact your administrator.

An error occurred with the SSL protocol.

Please check your account settings and try again.
If the problem persists please contact your administrator.

Alfresco in the Cloud is under heavy load right now!

Please try again in a few minutes.
Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

The server doesn\'t support chunk transfers.
Please reload your account.
An error has occurred. Please try again.
The URL is incorrect. Please check your account settings.
By tapping Sign Up, you are agreeing to the Alfresco Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
You\'ve signed up for Alfresco in the cloud using the email address:
Please check your email. We\'ve sent you a link that you\'ll need to use to complete the registration.
Please let us know if you are unable to activate your account.
Not receiving our email? Please check you entered the email address correctly and remember to look in your spam folders
Alfresco requires you to use your company email address so you can be added to your company collaboration network.
Your device is not connected to a network, some features may be disabled.
The file could not be opened.
This file format is not supported. You need to install an app that can read it.
There\'s no external application to pick a file.
The Like/Unlike tag for this content could not be retrieved.

Alfresco Mobile connects to Alfresco in the cloud and Alfresco on premise servers (3.4 and above) to provide safe access to your corporate content on the go.

Alfresco Mobile connects to your Alfresco repository using your Alfresco log-in credentials (over HTTP or HTTPS), and manages user access based on their permissions.
You need a PDF viewer to display this content.\n\nDo you want to get one now?
Do you want to share this as an attachment, or a clickable link?

plurals.name: delete_items
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\" items?

resources.string:
Data protection is active.

If you delete this account, your content will return to an unprotected state.

Are you sure you want to delete "%s"?
\"%s\" has been modified. Do you want to upload this new version?
You do not have a voice recorder on this device
Cannot complete the capturing of this information
This name is already in use.
An error occurred: Your file is saved inside "Downloads".
An error occurred: This name is already in use.
You don\'t have an app that will create this file type.
SD card must be accessible for this operation
Please login to an account first
Content is being protected. Please wait
Content is being unprotected. Please wait

Data protection is available.
Do you want to enable it?

This will encrypt all downloaded Alfresco content for every account, and will mean this content cannot be read by other apps, only from within the Alfresco app.

Would you like to protect all downloaded Alfresco content now?

This will be applied to all content you\'ve downloaded from all your Alfresco accounts, and will mean this content cannot be read by other apps, only from within the Alfresco app.

Would you like to unprotect all downloaded Alfresco content now?

This will be applied to all content you\'ve downloaded from all your Alfresco accounts.
Your request to join \"%s\" has been cancelled.
A problem prevented you from joining the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from leaving the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from favoriting the site \"%s\".
A problem prevented you from unfavoriting the site \"%s\".
The file is available inside \"%s\"\'s Download folder.
Files are available inside your \"Downloads\" folder.
An error occurred during the upload.
Alfresco Mobile : Unable to retrieve information.
SSL certificate validation has been disabled.
Erase all Alfresco Mobile data from this device after 10 failed passcode attempts
All local data has been removed.
Data protection allows all downloaded content to be readable only in the Alfresco app. (Enterprise customers only)
Rate Alfresco Mobile on Google Play
Favorite info for this content could not be retrieved.
Would you like to automatically keep your favorite content in sync with this device?

Do you want to deactivate sync?

All synced content will be deleted from your device.

You\'ve unfavorited %s since you started editing it.
Sync your edited version to the server or Save it to your \"Downloads\" folder.
%s has been deleted on the server but a copy has been saved in your \"Downloads\" folder.
You don\'t have the required permission to upload your edited version of %s. You can Save it to your \"Downloads\" folder, or Overwrite it with the server version which will discard your edits.

You are about to sync %s over a carrier connection.

Would you like to proceed?

You are trying to sync %1$s, only %2$s are available.

You need to free some space in your device or unfavorite some content.

You are about to sync %1$s, only %2$s remain on your device.

Would you like to proceed?
This document is not available on your device.

There\'s already a downloaded file with the same name.

Do you want to overwrite the existing file?

%s is already in use.
Please retry with another one.
Failed to load text into built-in editor
Text file is too large for editor
This file exceeds the size limit to be opened with the Alfresco Text Editor.
Text To Speech is not available inside your device.

Any unsaved changes will be lost.
